Localization.Name: Argo Astronautics
Localization.Description: This commercial ship manufacturer focuses on building shuttles, transport vessels and utility vehicles that can be seen around the universe.

English.Name: Argo Astronautics
English.Description: This commercial ship manufacturer focuses on building shuttles, transport vessels and utility vehicles that can be seen around the universe.

Localization.Name: J-Span
Localization.Description: J-Span does only one thing, but does it well. For over a century they have focused on producing quality coolers at a reasonable price. Half the time these days, when you pop the hull of a spacecraft, chances are you’re going to find a J-Span. Plus, their coolers can be found in more than just ships. They have a wide variety of sizes and shapes that can be found in everything from land transports, to computer systems, to refrigerator units. Appealing to the broader consumer market, their units might not have all the bells and whistles as some of the other manufacturer’s lines, but for the most part they avoid their quirks as well.

Appealing to the broader consumer market, their units might not have all the bells and whistles as some of the other manufacturer’s lines, but for the most part they avoid their quirks as well.

Localization.Name: Frost-Star SL
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Whether cruising across the ground or sailing through space, there’s a J-Span cooler perfect for you. The Frost-Star SL is a mid-tier cooler designed to bring the line’s reliability to ground and open-canopy vehicles.

Localization.Name: Juno Starwerk
Localization.Description: Second only to RSI in terms of longevity in the space industry, Juno Starwerk was founded in the 24th century to build long haul freighters to support the rapid Human expansion into other star systems. Utilitarian above all us, these ships were designed to do one thing: haul as much weight as possible as cheaply as possible. While, over time, as competition increased, their share of the ship market shrank, their components had earned a reputation for dependability and ease of maintenance. Their direct sales of these components soon made up the majority of the companies income and in 2513, the ceased ship manufacture entirely to focus on supplying industrial strength components. In parts of the ’verse there are generations of mechanics who have passed knowledge and techniques for working on Juno power plants like family heirlooms. This long history also means that Juno parts and repairs are easy to come by.

Localization.Name: Roughneck
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Industrial

For its class, the Roughneck power plant from Juno Starwerk is an ideal component for haulers looking for maximum performance.

English.Name: Roughneck

Item Type: Power Plant

Size: 1

Localization.Name: Basilisk
Localization.Description: Defensive system manufacturer who produces shield systems, ship armor and personal armor for both the military and private sector.

English.Name: Basilisk
English.Description: Defensive system manufacturer who produces shield systems, ship armor and personal armor for both the military and private sector.

Localization.Name: Bulwark
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Bulwark shield generator provides industrial-grade durability and increased performance, but at the expense of a higher emission level.

English.Name: Bulwark
English.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 1

Class: Industrial
